assets.inItems: Asset in Items | Assets in Items

authentication.description: The requested page requires authentication. Please provide your authentication details in the text field below.
authentication.title: Authentication

catalogs.noMatches: No catalogs match the given search criteria.

errors.badRequest: The request is invalid. This might be due to invalid parameters, e.g. in a search request, or could be a bug in STAC Browser.
errors.contactProvider: Please contact the service operator to resolve this issue.
errors.forbidden: The credentials specified for this request are invalid, e.g. an expired or invalid API token. Please provide other credentials and try again.
errors.loadFilteredItems: Sorry, loading a filtered list of STAC Items failed.
errors.loadItems: Sorry, loading the list of STAC Items failed.
errors.networkError: This issue may occur when servers don't allow external access via web browsers (e.g., when CORS headers are not present). @:browse.contactProvider
errors.noExternalAccess: Accessing external catalogs is not allowed!
errors.notFound: The requested resource does not exist. @:browse.contactProvider
errors.unauthorized: The request lacks credentials, e.g. an API token. Please provide your credentials and try again.

index.urlMissingHost: The URL is missing a host.
index.urlMissingProtocol: The URL is missing a protocol.

search.noItemsFound: No items found for the given filters.
search.notSupported: Item Search is not supported by the API.
search.title: Search
